name: .OCA File Extension
summary: Learn about .OCA files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Accompanying file saved with Visual Basic custom control (.OCX) files; contains standard descriptions of objects, properties, and methods used by OLE Automation; created automatically by Visual Basic and given the same name as the custom control except for the file extension.

content: OCA files are binary files that serve as both extended type libraries and a cache for OCX files. If an OCA file is deleted, it can be rebuilt by Visual Basic, but will take extra time.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
